alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:44AM EST until February 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, Newburgh Dam, and J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent precipitation caused the Ohio River to rise. The river at Shawneetown, Mount Vernon, Newburgh Dam, and J.T. Myers will remain in minor flood as they have already crested, or will crest soon, and they will all fall below flood stage sometime this weekend. For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 37.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
